RULES.page.1.de-DE:

[blue]1.1: Keine Spam-Nachrichten oder unangemessenen Inhalte.
[blue]1.2: Im Ingame-Voice gelten die gleichen Regeln wie im Chat, Soundboards sind auch im Ingame-Voice untersagt.

RULES.page.1.en-US:
Rules
[blue]1.1: No spam messages or inappropriate content.
[blue]1.2: The same rules apply in the in-game voice as in the chat, soundboards are also prohibited in the in-game voice.
[blue]1.3: We are not responsible for disputes or problems in your private life. Anyone who tries to resolve such problems via support or in chat will be punished.
